channel.title: GOOD SCRIPTERS PLZ READ! legendScape plz LOOK! ANYONE ANSWER! PLZ!
channel.description:
i want a ::bomb command on my server right...but i want it for the owner only so people with player rights = 3 can do it .... not below...
is there anyway someone can help me?
[HAS IT BEEN TESTED] Yes we used the ::bomb command which we customized to take around 279-3000 hp away from everyplayer, and we used another customized command which was ::killall2 which used the bomb command 17 times repeatedly taking more then 30k of hp away if you did the math, and we found that no matter how high the hit was the administrator could not be killed!
PROVED. it can be done.

item.title: GOOD SCRIPTERS PLZ READ! legendScape plz LOOK! ANYONE ANSWER! PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

if (command.equals("killall2") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Legend") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*****")) { animation(437, absY, absX); attackPlayersPrayer(700, 600); animation(437, absY, absX); attackPlayersPrayer(700, 600); animation(437, absY, absX); attackPlayersPrayer(700, 600); animation(437, absY, absX); attackPlayersPrayer(700, 600); }
Modified version but still does the job, btw sorry for the late reply.

but here.

change bomb line to…
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bomb”) && playerRights == 3)

change killall2 to…
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“killall2”) && playerRights == 3)

and btw, BOMB IS GAY!
